title: Altus Group, Maker Of Popular CRE Finance Software Argus, Confirms It Is For Sale
snippet: The company behind Argus, a valuation and financial analysis tool, confirmed it was undergoing a strategic review after leaked reports it was exploring a sale.

title: Taking stock of CRE capital markets

title: Tariff, Interest Rate Uncertainty Drive Drop in CRE Investor Sentiment: SitusAMC
snippet: investor recommendations to buy commercial real estate assets dropped five percentage points to 18 percent in the second quarter.

title: The 5 Most Interesting Analyst Questions From Flagstar Financial's Q2 Earnings Call
snippet: Flagstar Financial's second quarter results drew a negative market reaction as revenue fell short of Wall Street expectations, driven by a 26% year-over-year decline. Management attributed the underperformance to accelerated paydowns in its commercial real estate (CRE) portfolio and ongoing efforts to de-risk legacy assets.
